1T1h1e1 1K1i1n1d1e1s1t1 1C1u1t1 1o1f1 1A2l1:1 1A1 1P1o1r1k1 1R1i1b1 1W1i1t1h1 1S1l1o1w1-1C2o1k1e1d1 1C1o1m1f1o1r1t1s

1W1i1t1h1 1i1t1s1 1d2e1p1 1p1o1r1k1 1f1l1a1v1o1r1,1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1 1i1s1 1i1d1e1a1l1 1i1n1 1s1l1o1w1-1c2o1k1e1d1 1w1i1n1t1e1r1 1d1i1s1h1e1s1 1l1i1k1e1 1t1h1i1s1 1p1o1r1k1 1s1t1e1w1 1w1i1t1h1 1p1e1a1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1w2e1t1 1p1o1t1a1t1o1e1s1.1 1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1M1e1l1i1n1a1 1H1a2m1e1r1 1f1o1r1 1T1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1T1i1m1e1s

1W1h1y1 1o2d1b1a2l1?1 1F1i1r1s1t1,1 1i1t1 1s1u2f1e1r1s1 1f1r1o1m1 1s1o1m1e1t1h1i1n1g1 1o1f1 1a1n1 1i1d1e1n1t1i1t1y1 1c1r1i1s1i1s1,1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1d1e1s1p1i1t1e1 1i1t1s1 1n1a1m1e1 1i1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1o1t1 1r1e1a2l1y1 1a1 1r1i1b1.1 1S1e1c1o1n1d1,1 1i1t1 1h1a1s1 1a1n1 1i1n1d1e1t1e1r1m1i1n1a1t1e1 1c1o1m1p1o1s1i1t1i1o1n1,1 1c1o1n1s1i1s1t1i1n1g1 1o1f1 1b1o1t1h1 1l1i1g1h1t1 1a1n1d1 1d1a1r1k1 1m1e1a1t1.1 1F1i1n1a2l1y1,1 1i1t1 1h1a1s1 1a1 1t1e1n1d1e1n1c1y1 1t1o1 1s1l1i1d1e1 1i1n1t1o1 1d1i1s1r1e1p1u1t1a1b1l1e1 1t1e2r1i1t1o1r1y1,1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1i1t1s1 1n1a1m1e1 1i1s1 1s1o1m1e1t1i1m1e1s1 1a2p1r1o1p1r1i1a1t1e1d1 1f1o1r1 1l1e2s1 1d1e1s1i1r1a1b1l1e1 1c1u1t1s1.

1B1u1t1 1l1i1k1e1 1a1n1y1 1g2o1d1 1a1n1t1i1h1e1r1o1,1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1 1h1a1s1 1h1i2d1e1n1 1v1i1r1t1u1e1s1.1 1I1t1 1h1a1s1 1r1i1c1h1,1 1d2e1p1 1p1o1r1k1 1f1l1a1v1o1r1;1 1i1t1 1i1s1 1g1e1n1e1r1a2l1y1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1s1t1 1i1n1e1x1p1e1n1s1i1v1e1 1c1u1t1 1o1f1 1p1o1r1k1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1m1e1a1t1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1r1;1 1a1n1d1 1i1t1 1i1s1 1i1d1e1a1l1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1s1l1o1w1-1c2o1k1e1d1 1d1i1s1h1e1s1 1w1e1 1c1r1a1v1e1 1i1n1 1c2o1l1 1w1e1a1t1h1e1r1.

1T1o1 1u1n1d1e1r1s1t1a1n1d1 1t1h1i1s1 1c1u1t1,1 1y1o1u1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1n2e1d1 1t1o1 1k1n1o1w1 1t1h1e1 1b1l1a1d1e1 1p1o1r1k1 1c1h1o1p1.1 1T1h1i1s1 1c1h1o1p1 1i1s1 1c1u1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1t1w1o1 1r1i1b1s1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1 1e1n1d1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1r1k1 1l1o1i1n1.1 1B1e1c1a1u1s1e1 1i1t1 1c1o1m1e1s1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1t1e1r1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1n1d1e1r1 1l1o1i1n1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1f1a1t1-1l1a1d1e1n1 1a1n1d1 1g1n1a1r1l1y1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1,1 1i1t1 1h1a1s1 1q1u1a1l1i1t1i1e1s1 1o1f1 1b1o1t1h1.

1Y1o1u1 1c1a1n1 1r1e1c1o1g1n1i1z1e1 1t1r1a1d1i1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1s1l1e1n1d1e1r1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1r1i1b1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1u1r1v1e1s1 1p1r1e2t1i1l1y1 1a1l1o1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1b1o2t1o1m1.1 1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1M1e1l1i1n1a1 1H1a2m1e1r1 1f1o1r1 1T1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1T1i1m1e1s

1T1h1e1n1 1s1o1m1e1t1i1m1e1 1b1a1c1k1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1t1e1 111916101s1 1o1r1 1e1a1r1l1y1 1‚1Ä1ô17101s1,1 1a1 1C1h1i1c1a1g1o1-1a1r1e1a1 1b1u1t1c1h1e1r1,1 1C1l1i2f1 1B1o1w1e1s1,1 1c1a1m1e1 1u1p1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1i1d1e1a1 1o1f1 1t1a1k1i1n1g1 1a1d1v1a1n1t1a1g1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1r1i1t1y1 1o1f1 1r1i1b1s1 1b1y1 1f1a1s1h1i1o1n1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1l1o1w1l1y1 1c1h1o1p1s1 1i1n1t1o1 1s1t1r1i1p1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1r1e1s1e1m1b1l1e1d1 1r1i1b1s1.1 1T1o1 1d1o1 1s1o1,1 1h1e1 1b1u2t1e1r1f1l1i1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1c1h1o1p1s1 1a1n1d1 1c1u1t1 1t1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1t1h1e1 1r1i1b1s1.

1C1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1i1n1 1s1t1o1r1y
1Y1o1u1 1c1a1n1 1r1e1c1o1g1n1i1z1e1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1t1r1a1d1i1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1s1l1e1n1d1e1r1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1r1i1b1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1u1r1v1e1s1 1p1r1e2t1i1l1y1 1a1l1o1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1b1o2t1o1m1.1 1I1 1a1s1k1e1d1 1b1u1t1c1h1e1r1s1 1i1n1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1a1n1d1 1B1o1s1t1o1n1 1t1o1 1c1u1t1 1m1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1b1o1t1h1 1d1i1d1 1i1t1 1t1h1i1s1 1w1a1y1.

1I1n1 1a1 1w1o1r1l1d1 1i1n1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1e1v1e1r1y1o1n1e1 1u1s1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1w1o1r1d1s1 1t1o1 1m1e1a1n1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1t1h1i1n1g1,1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1b1e1 1t1h1e1 1e1n1d1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1o1r1y1.1 1B1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1a2p1r1o1a1c1h1 1o1f1 1b1u1t1c1h1e1r1s1 1t1e1n1d1s1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1l1i1k1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1o1f1 1H1u1m1p1t1y1 1D1u1m1p1t1y1,1 1w1h1o1 1s1a1i1d1 1i1n1 1‚1Ä1ú1T1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1t1h1e1 1L2o1k1i1n1g1-1G1l1a2s1,1‚1Ä1ù1 1‚1Ä1ú1W1h1e1n1 1I1 1u1s1e1 1a1 1w1o1r1d1,1 1i1t1 1m1e1a1n1s1 1j1u1s1t1 1w1h1a1t1 1I1 1c1h2o1s1e1 1i1t1 1t1o1 1m1e1a1n1.1‚1Ä1ù1 1S1o1 1i1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1o1t1 1s1u1r1p1r1i1s1i1n1g1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1r2e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1c1u1t1s1 1a1r1e1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1m1a1r1k1e1t1e1d1 1u1n1d1e1r1 1t1h1i1s1 1n1a1m1e1.

1C1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1 1a1r1e1 1b1u2t1e1r1f1l1i1e1d1 1b1l1a1d1e1 1p1o1r1k1 1c1h1o1p1s1 1c1u1t1 1t1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1t1h1e1 1r1i1b1.1 1B1e1c1a1u1s1e1 1t1h1e1 1b1l1a1d1e1 1p1o1r1k1 1c1h1o1p1 1i1s1 1c1u1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1t1w1o1 1r1i1b1s1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1 1e1n1d1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1r1k1 1l1o1i1n1 1‚1Ä1î1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1t1e1r1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1n1d1e1r1 1l1o1i1n1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1f1a1t1-1l1a1d1e1n1 1a1n1d1 1g1n1a1r1l1y1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1 1‚1Ä1î1 1i1t1 1h1a1s1 1q1u1a1l1i1t1i1e1s1 1o1f1 1b1o1t1h1.1 1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1S1t1e1v1e1 1S1t1a1n1k1i1e1w1i1c1z
1S1o1m1e1t1i1m1e1s1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1a1 1c1u1r1v1i1n1g1 1r1i1b1 1b1o1n1e1,1 1y1o1u1‚1Ä1ô2l1 1f1i1n1d1 1a1 1f1l1a1t1 1l1i2t1l1e1 1t1w1o1-1 1o1r1 1t1h1r2e1-1i1n1c1h1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1b1o1n1e1 1l1u1r1k1i1n1g1 1a1l1o1n1g1 1o1n1e1 1e1d1g1e1 1o1f1 1y1o1u1r1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1.1 1T1h1i1s1 1m1e1a1n1s1 1t1h1e1 1c1h1o1p1 1w1a1s1 1c1u1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1 1j1u1s1t1 1a1d1j1a1c1e1n1t1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1r1i1b1s1;1 1t1h1e1 1b1o1n1e1 1i1s1 1a1 1p1i1e1c1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1c1a1p1u1l1a1.1 1B1u1t1 1t1h1i1s1 1i1s1 1r1e1a2l1y1 1n1o1t1 1a1 1b1i1g1 1d1e1a1l1.1 1R1i1b1s1 1f1a1b1r1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1i1s1 1f1a1s1h1i1o1n1 1w1i2l1 1h1a1v1e1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1m1o1r1e1 1f1a1t1 1a1n1d1 1c1o2n1e1c1t1i1v1e1 1t1i2s1u1e1 1a1n1d1 1m1o1r1e1 1d1a1r1k1 1m1e1a1t1,1 1b1u1t1 1a1r1e1 1s1t1i2l1 1c1l1o1s1e1 1c1o1u1s1i1n1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1t1r1a1d1i1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1c1u1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1c2o1k1 1u1p1 1t1h1e1 1s1a1m1e1 1w1a1y1.

1T1h1a1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1o1t1 1t1h1e1 1e1n1d1 1o1f1 1i1t1,1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1.1 1S1o1m1e1 1b1u1t1c1h1e1r1s1 1w1i2l1 1c1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1l1o1w1e1r1 1p1a1r1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1o1r1k1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1e1r1 1i1n1t1o1 1s1t1r1i1p1s1 1a1n1d1 1l1a1b1e1l1 1t1h1e1m1 1‚1Ä1ú1b1o1n1e1l1e2s1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1.1‚1Ä1ù1 1T1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1s1t1i2l1 1t1a1s1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1w1o1r1k1 1w1e2l1 1i1n1 1l1o1n1g1-1c2o1k1i1n1g1 1r1e1c1i1p1e1s1,1 1b1u1t1 1y1o1u1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1o1 1p1a1y1 1c1l1o1s1e1r1 1a2t1e1n1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1w1h1a1t1 1y1o1u1‚1Ä1ô1r1e1 1g1e2t1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1a1v1o1i1d1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1e1x1c1e2s1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1s1 1o1f1 1f1a1t1 1a1n1d1 1g1n1a1r1l1.

1T1h1e1n1 1t1h1e1r1e1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1t1h1e1 1h1i1g1h1e1r1-1c1l1a2s1 1i1m1p1o1s1t1o1r1.1 1S1o1m1e1t1i1m1e1s1 1b1o1n1e1l1e2s1 1r1i1b1-1e1y1e1 1c1h1o1p1s1 1a1r1e1 1f1a1s1h1i1o1n1e1d1 1i1n1t1o1 1l1o1n1g1,1 1s1l1e1n1d1e1r1 1p1i1e1c1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1c1a2l1e1d1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1.1 1Y1o1u1 1c1a1n1 1t1e2l1 1t1h1e1m1 1c1l1e1a1r1l1y1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1m1u1c1h1 1l1i1g1h1t1e1r1 1c1o1l1o1r1 1a1n1d1 1h1i1g1h1e1r1 1p1r1i1c1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1u1s1u1a2l1y1 1t1w1i1c1e1 1a1s1 1e1x1p1e1n1s1i1v1e1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1a1l1 1t1h1i1n1g1.1 1B1u1t1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1t1h1i1s1 1p1o1r1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1p1i1g1 1i1s1 1m1u1c1h1 1l1e1a1n1e1r1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1r1e1f1o1r1e1 1c2o1k1s1 1d1i2f1e1r1e1n1t1l1y1,1 1w1e1‚1Ä1ô2l1 1b1y1p1a2s1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1e1r1s1a1t1z1 1r1i1b1s1 1f1o1r1 1n1o1w1.

1A1n1y1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1v1e1r1s1i1o1n1s1,1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1,1 1w1i2l1 1w1o1r1k1 1j1u1s1t1 1f1i1n1e1,1 1p1a1r1t1i1c1u1l1a1r1l1y1 1i1n1 1s1t1e1w1s1 1a1n1d1 1b1r1a1i1s1e1s1.

1I1n1 1a2d1i1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1i1t1s1 1p1r1o1p1o1r1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1l1e1a1n1 1m1e1a1t1 1t1o1 1f1a1t1 1a1n1d1 1c1o2l1a1g1e1n1,1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1 1a1l1s1o1 1h1a1s1 1a1 1s1h1a1p1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1a1k1e1s1 1i1t1 1i1d1e1a1l1 1f1o1r1 1s1t1e1w1s1.1 1I1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1h1a1r1d1 1t1o1 1f1i1n1d1 1p1r1e1-1c1u1t1 1p1o1r1k1 1s1t1e1w1 1m1e1a1t1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1p1e1r1m1a1r1k1e1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1e1v1e1n1 1i1f1 1y1o1u1 1d1o1 1i1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1o1t1 1a1 1g2o1d1 1i1d1e1a1 1t1o1 1b1u1y1 1i1t1,1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1i1t1 1u1s1u1a2l1y1 1c1o1n1s1i1s1t1s1 1o1f1 1r1a2g1e1d1 1l1i2t1l1e1 1o2d1s1 1a1n1d1 1e1n1d1s1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1r1o1u1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1p1i1g1.

1C1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1i1n1 1s1t1o1r1y
1P1h1o1t1o

1B1r1a1i1s1e1d1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1.1 1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1M1e1l1i1n1a1 1H1a2m1e1r1 1f1o1r1 1T1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1T1i1m1e1s
1S1o1 1t1h1e1 1u1s1u1a1l1 1d1r1i2l1 1i1s1 1t1o1 1b1u1y1 1a1 1B1o1s1t1o1n1 1b1u2t1 1a1n1d1 1b1u1t1c1h1e1r1 1i1t1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1i1s1 1a1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1a1b1l1e1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1w1o1r1k1.1 1C1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1h1a1v1e1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1a1b1l1y1 1l1e2s1 1f1a1t1 1a1n1d1 1g1n1a1r1l1 1t1h1a1n1 1t1h1e1 1b1u2t1 1a1n1d1 1c1o1m1e1 1i1n1 1n1e1a1t1 1p1i1e1c1e1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1a1r1e1 1e1a1s1i1l1y1 1s1l1i1c1e1d1 1u1p1.

1I1n1 1a1 1s1i1m1i1l1a1r1 1w1a1y1,1 1c1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1s1t1y1l1e1 1r1i1b1s1 1b1r1o1w1n1 1q1u1i1c1k1l1y1 1a1n1d1 1f1i1t1 1n1e1a1t1l1y1 1i1n1t1o1 1a1 1D1u1t1c1h1 1o1v1e1n1 1f1o1r1 1l1o1n1g1,1 1s1l1o1w1 1b1r1a1i1s1i1n1g1.

1I1 1d1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1g1o1 1f1o1r1 1p1r1e1-1s1a1l1t1i1n1g1 1m1e1a1t1,1 1b1e1c1a1u1s1e1 1I1 1r1a1r1e1l1y1 1t1h1i1n1k1 1f1a1r1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1 1a1h1e1a1d1 1t1o1 1d1o1 1i1t1.1 1B1u1t1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1r1i1b1s1 1d1o1 1b1e1n1e1f1i1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1c1e2s1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1s1o1m1e1h1o1w1 1e1v1e1n1s1 1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1c2o1k1i1n1g1 1t1i1m1e1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1d1a1r1k1e1r1 1a1n1d1 1l1i1g1h1t1e1r1 1s1e1c1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1s1o1 1I1 1r1e1c1o2m1e1n1d1 1i1t1.


1I1f1 1y1o1u1 1f1o1r1g1e1t1 1i1t1,1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1,1 1f1o1r1g1e1 1a1h1e1a1d1.1 1T1h1e1 1r1e1s1u1l1t1s1 1w1i2l1 1s1t1i2l1 1b1e1 1d1e1l1i1c1i1o1u1s1.

1R1e1c1i1p1e1s1:1 1B1r1a1i1s1e1d1 1C1o1u1n1t1r1y1-1S1t1y1l1e1 1P1o1r1k1 1R1i1b1s1 1W1i1t1h1 1C1h1i1p1o1t1l1e1 1|1 1P1o1r1k1 1S1t1e1w1 1W1i1t1h1 1P1e1a1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1S1w2e1t1 1P1o1t1a1t1o1e1s

1F1o2l1o1w1 1N1Y1T1 1F2o1d1 1o1n1 1F1a1c1e1b2o1k1,1 1I1n1s1t1a1g1r1a1m1,1 1T1w1i2t1e1r1 1a1n1d1 1P1i1n1t1e1r1e1s1t1.1 1G1e1t1 1r1e1g1u1l1a1r1 1u1p1d1a1t1e1s1 1f1r1o1m1 1N1Y1T1 1C2o1k1i1n1g1,1 1w1i1t1h1 1r1e1c1i1p1e1 1s1u2g1e1s1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1c2o1k1i1n1g1 1t1i1p1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1h1o2p1i1n1g1 1a1d1v1i1c1e1.
